body: The reason the tests passed earlier was because of the fact that the flip function was being tested on square tensors. This meant that `self.size(i)` was same for all `i` causing the failure to not be caught.
body_html: The reason the tests passed earlier was because of the fact that the flip function was being tested on square tensors. This meant that self.size(i) was same for all i causing the failure to not be caught.
